author: By Nigel Thompson
title: British Travel Awards: Win easyJet flights and spending money by voting in industry's 'Oscars'
text:
Get your next break off to a flying start with an amazing British Travel Awards prize from easyJet.
Casting a vote in this year’s holiday “Oscars” could win you £800 towards two easyJet return flights of your choice; and £1,000 loaded on to a euro currency card by easyJet.
The airline has flights from airports across the UK so there’s bound to be one near you – and it has one of the biggest route networks across Europe and beyond.
Your currency card could be used to pay at shops, bars and restaurants all over Europe – anywhere Visa cards are accepted – with no transaction fees or ATM charges.
The Daily Mirror is a media partner of the prestigious travel Awards and the public vote is now open until September 30.
Everyone who submits a vote for the awards is entered into a draw for a treasure chest of prizes worth £30,000-plus in total.
Each week on these pages we’ll highlight another great prize up for grabs – you could win cruises, beach holidays, travel vouchers and discounts or even a trip to meet Santa in Lapland.
How it works All you have to do is vote online at britishtravelawards.com – simply register then off you go.
Previously, voters had to be resident in the UK, but it’s now been opened up to people abroad.
There are more than 70 categories but you do not have to vote in every one – you can opt for as many or as few as you want.
So, for example, if you want to vote only for your favourite cruise line and nothing else, you can.
The online voting form also allows you to return to it as many times as you like up to September 30 to change your votes, or add new ones.
You’ll also be invited to take part in a travel survey that looks at the UK’s holiday plans for 2016.
It’s voluntary and, like the awards voting, you can do as much or as little as you like.
As a thank-you for taking part in the survey you get a bonus entry in the holiday prize draw.
When all the votes have been counted the award winners will be announced at a glittering gala evening to be held in London on November 25.
Full terms and conditions at britishtravelawards.com DailyMirror
